About her

Art

An artist’s style should be recognizable as easily as the patterns of a handwritten letter. At least, that is what most artists should look for on the journey to develop their talent.
Daniela Valentino’s paintings have a fine balance of composition, beauty, and talent, but what intrigues the most is her style. It is honest, and direct, it communicates what she wants to say clearly within the lines, the texture of her paintings. Her series “Parvenze” speaks volumes about this, she is sensually descriptive without being tasteless, passionate without being cliche’. There, she not only shows a clear understanding of human anatomy but also composition.

Bio

Daniela has dedicated her life to art at a young age. She began her education under the traditional method of becoming an apprentice first before becoming independent. She studied under re-known Masters such as Carotenuto, di Giulio, Mereviglia, Fratelli Mazzella. She formalized her studies at the Academy of Fine Arts of Naples, she Majored in fine Arts and Theater where graduated with honors.
